description: This is a Django URL configuration module defining various URL patterns and routing them to corresponding view functions related to health checks, authentication, quizzes, submissions, leaderboards, and administrative endpoints.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles the health check endpoint, likely returning a status indicating the service is operational.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Returns information about the currently authenticated user.

methods.name: list_quizzes
methods.description: Returns a list of available quizzes.

methods.name: my_quizzes
methods.description: Returns quizzes associated with the current user.

methods.name: quiz_detail
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific quiz.

methods.name: start_attempt
methods.description: Starts a user's attempt on a specific quiz.

methods.name: submit_mcq_answer
methods.description: Submits answers for an MCQ question within an attempt.

methods.name: submit_crossword_answer
methods.description: Submits answers for a crossword question within an attempt.

methods.name: finalize_attempt
methods.description: Finalizes and submits a quiz attempt.

methods.name: leaderboard
methods.description: Retrieves the leaderboard for a specific quiz.

methods.name: audit_logs
methods.description: Provides audit logs for administrative review.
